item.title: Crysis 3
item.dc:creator: @Jaded Jaded
item.description:
@Jaded wrote:

Reminds me of Halo, tho it is a unique fps shooting game. I havenâ€™t tried it but if I start see some friends of mine start playing, I probably will.
Weapons wise, seems like a mix of CoD, Battlefield and Halo weapons. I like it!

Tejbz, the famous gamer have posted a few gameplay videos about the game, here is one:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_K7WeONlg2Y&list=UUDeli5gVzZh6Lt_fyw_Xrjw&index=3[/youtube]

Okay, after watching a few videos about crysis 3 on his channel, it really got me attracted. When I get the cash I will buy this, looks great
